tasks.title: MVP-Lite Day 1: Foundation & Dashboard UI
tasks.description: Build the foundation UI for AIOS v2 MVP-Lite including routing, layout, and dashboard page with specific design requirements

context.goal: Create a working dashboard that connects to backend and shows recent results

deliverables: MORNING (4 hours):
Set up Next.js routing for exactly 4 pages: /, /process, /agents, /results/[id]
Create Layout component with sidebar navigation showing: Dashboard, Process Content, My Agents
Build Dashboard page matching this EXACT design:
- Header: 'AIOS v2' logo left, user icon right with 'John Doe'
- Welcome section: 'Welcome to AIOS v2' heading
- Two primary CTAs: 'ðŸ“¤ Process Content' and 'ðŸ¤– My Agents' as large buttons
- Recent Results section with ResultCard components showing:
â€¢ File name/URL
â€¢ Agent used
â€¢ Time ago (e.g., '2 hours ago')
â€¢ First line of result preview
- Use Tailwind classes: bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg p-6
Create ResultCard component with hover effect and click to view full result
Implement mobile responsive with bottom navigation for mobile
AFTERNOON (4 hours):
Connect dashboard to backend GET /api/results endpoint
Add loading skeleton while fetching (use gray animated boxes)
Implement error boundary with friendly error message
Create shared UI components in /components/ui/:
- Button.tsx with variants: primary, secondary, outline
- Card.tsx with shadow and hover effects
- LoadingSpinner.tsx
- ErrorMessage.tsx
Add TypeScript interfaces for all data structures
Test responsive design on mobile/tablet/desktop breakpoints

api_endpoints: GET /api/results - Returns recent 10 results with: id, title, agentName, createdAt, preview
technical_requirements.styling: Use existing Tailwind config, maintain consistent spacing (p-4, p-6, gap-4)

tasks.signals_when_done: Dashboard displays mock/real recent results, navigation works to all 4 pages, responsive on all devices, loading states work
tasks.autonomy_level: HIGH - Make design decisions that improve UX while following specifications
tasks.special_instructions: Focus on clean, simple design. Don't over-engineer. The dashboard should feel welcoming and easy to use. Test everything as you build.
tasks.process_reminder: Update status to 'in_progress' when starting, commit code frequently, update to 'ready_for_review' when complete

history.summary: Demo Video Production & User Onboarding Assets completed

history.summary: AIOS v2 User Documentation & Onboarding Experience completed with full user adoption system
history.completion_message: User documentation and onboarding completed with interactive onboarding flow, comprehensive help system, tutorial system, contextual tooltips, FAQ system, feedback system, accessibility features, and user preferences. Ready for seamless user adoption of AIOS v2 MVP.

Successfully completed comprehensive repository cleanup with 28 files archived, 3 phase directories moved, 35+ empty directories cleaned, and 4 new documentation categories created. Repository is now production-ready with clean structure and complete traceability.

history.summary: Production Launch Assets - Landing Page & Marketing Materials completed with full conversion optimization
history.completion_message: Complete landing page with 7 React components, demo video script, and comprehensive social media marketing assets created. Production-ready for AIOS v2 launch with conversion-optimized user acquisition funnel.
